column4: i have an older box running suse 7.3 and want to put ubuntu on it (it meets all the system requirements), but it will not let me boot the ubuntu installer cd...  it will let me boot onto the suse 7.3 cd, but not knoppix either.  what is going on?
not on a t1 by any means
just starting up a business and would like to run my own web server
